trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Arvada
There were no other sightings in Arvada on or around September 21st 2008
Summary: bright star changing direction and fading away
divs: Sighting DetailsI was getting out of my car when I saw something out of the corner of my eye. I looked up and there was a very bright star about the same size as venus but slightly brighter. I originally though it was a very bright falling star. but the object did not fade it kept going and also did not go straight. I watched the object as it went south east towards denver it almost faded at the horizon then it made a sweeping u turn and came back north almost the exact path that it had gone south. but at much greater speed and rapidly gaining altitude to the point where it looked like a satalite going north. It travelled from the southern horizon to the northern horizon in approx 45 seconds with absolutly no sound. I lost sight of the object before the northern horizon as if it was gaining altitude not flying level like a plane would when I originally saw the object it was swerving slightly but when it headed south it was almost perfectly straight. Not sure if what I saw was paranormal just strange Hope someone knows what it was. I watched the sky for nearly two hours after but did not see anything else that night
